verses.verse: How blessed <S%H835><s%> is the man <S%H376><s%> who <S%H834><s%> does not walk <S%H1980><s%> in the counsel <S%H6098><s%> of the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> Nor <S%H3808><s%> stand <S%H5975><s%> in the path <S%H1870><s%> of sinners, <S%H2400><s%> Nor <S%H3808><s%> sit <S%H3427><s%> in the seat <S%H4186><s%> of scoffers! <S%H9238><s%>
But his delight <S%H2656><s%> is in the law <S%H8451><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> And in His law <S%H8451><s%> he meditates <S%H1897><s%> day <S%H3119><s%> and night. <S%H3915><s%>

And he will be like a tree <S%H6086><s%> [firmly] planted <S%H8362><s%> by streams <S%H6388><s%> of water, <S%H4325><s%> Which <S%H834><s%> yields <S%H5414><s%> its fruit <S%H6529><s%> in its season, <S%H6256><s%> And its leaf <S%H5929><s%> does not wither; <S%H5034><s%> And in whatever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> he does, <S%H6213><s%> he prospers. <S%H6743><s%>
The wicked <S%H7563><s%> are not so, <S%H3651><s%> But they are like chaff <S%H4671><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the wind <S%H7307><s%> drives <S%H5086><s%> away. <S%H5086><s%>

Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%> will not stand <S%H6965><s%> in the judgment, <S%H4941><s%> Nor <S%H3808><s%> sinners <S%H2400><s%> in the assembly <S%H5712><s%> of the righteous. <S%H6662><s%>
For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> knows <S%H3045><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> of the righteous, <S%H6662><s%> But the way <S%H1870><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> will perish.
